member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.ServiceExtensions.AddWd3eCms(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: 在应用程序中添加Wd3e CMS服务。

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.ServiceExtensions.AddWd3eCms(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,System.Action{Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.Wd3eCoreBuilder})
